bridge-type.label: Caddx
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the Caddx Serial interface.

channel.label: Reset Bridge
channel.description: Resets the communication with the panel

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Caddx Bridge Serial Port
parameter.description: The serial port name for the communication. Valid values are e.g. COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux.

parameter.name: baudrate
parameter.label: Baud Rate
parameter.description: The baud rate of the serial port. Valid values are 9600 (default), 19200, 38400, 57600, and 115200.

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Caddx Bridge Protocol
parameter.description: The configured panel protocol. Valid values are Binary and Ascii.
